data.text: @BostonGlobe The globe would print anything to put Trump down and they have zero ethics.  They do this of course because they know the only people that buy their rag are rabid liberals and they must continue to shovel this crap at them to sell their pathetic newspaper
@DavidAColton @BostonGlobe Put your hand where the sun don’t shine

@BostonGlobe If the Boston Globe was anything close to a real newspaper then ..Where are your facts???? Let's hear the tapes. You have them, right???? And you're getting editorials...hmmmm??? From other Trump bashing bu%#sh"t papers. 🤔
@BostonGlobe Everyone who needs to hear him say the N word to believe he’s a racist please raise your hand.
@BostonGlobe When we hear the tapes lets revisit. Until then its just more bs prove me wrong then Ill believe it.

@BostonGlobe You leftist commies are like little children. Your little tantrums, name calling, & finger pointing only prove what spoiled little shits you've become. The nation needs to throw all of you across it's lap & spank the bejeezus out of you all for your incredibly disgusting behavior
@BostonGlobe Typical globe lousy stories. No investgation or verification.  Your staff are a joke.
@BostonGlobe This tweet is dispointing when it cannot be verified by a person dismissed from her job at White House and is disgruntled. Shame on you. Ended my subscription
@BostonGlobe What does it say about her? She kept working for that deplorable man. #SAD
@BostonGlobe Why didn’t @OMAROSA step in during the campaign?

@BostonGlobe We all knew of Donald Trump's psychology,, character flaws & behavioral weaknesses before the election. With no psychological care or coaching, of course he won"t be different now. No desire to change so more stories like this will be reported. #executivecoaching @nbc @cbs @ABC

@BostonGlobe Why are countless people that know and possess such information, staying silent to protect Trump? Thank God for Omarosa that selfishly told us what Trump is when we needed to know and not when it suited her.
@BostonGlobe Why then, as woman of color, would she pine to be in the Trump cabinet knowing he’s a racist jackass? One wonders🤔
@BostonGlobe His base will love those tapes.
@BostonGlobe Aha yeah trust someone he fired lol im sure she isnt salty
